name: Add splash animation
description: Adds old style splash animation.

name: Alternative thumbnails
description: Adds an option to replace video thumbnails with still image captures of the video.

name: Ambient mode switch
description: Bypass the restrictions of ambient mode or disable it completely.

name: Amoled
description: Applies pure black theme on some components.

name: Append time stamps information
description: Add the current video quality or playback speed in brackets next to the current time.

name: Background play
description: Enables playing music in the background.

name: Bitrate default value
description: Set the audio quality to "Always High" when you first install the app.

name: Certificate spoof
description: Spoofs the YouTube Music certificate for Android Auto.

name: Change homepage
description: Change home page to subscription feed.

description: Changes the YouTube Music launcher icon to MMT.

description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon to MMT.

description: Changes the YouTube Music launcher icon to Revancify Blue.

description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon to Revancify Blue.

description: Changes the YouTube launcher icon to Revancify Red.

name: Custom branding name YouTube

description: Rename the YouTube Music app to the name specified in options.json.

name: Custom playback speed
description: Adds more playback speed options.

description: Adds more playback speed options.

description: Change the opacity of the player background, when player controls are visible.

name: Custom seekbar color
description: Change seekbar color in video player and video thumbnails.

description: Adds ability to set default playback speed settings.

name: Default video quality
description: Adds ability to set default video quality settings.

name: Disable HDR video
description: Disable HDR video.

name: Disable QUIC protocol
description: Disable CronetEngine's QUIC protocol.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Disables forced auto captions.

description: Disables forced auto captions.

name: Disable haptic feedback
description: Disable haptic feedback when swiping.

name: Disable landscape mode
description: Disable landscape mode when entering fullscreen.

name: Disable screenshot popup
description: Disables the popup that shows up when taking a screenshot.

name: Disable shorts on startup
description: Disables playing YouTube Shorts when launching YouTube.

name: Disable speed overlay
description: Disable 'Play at 2x speed' while holding down.

name: Enable black navigation bar
description: Sets the navigation bar color to black.

name: Enable color match player
description: Matches the color of the mini player and the fullscreen player.

name: Enable compact controls overlay
description: Enables compact control overlay.

name: Enable compact dialog

name: Enable custom filter
description: Enables custom filter to hide layout components.

description: Adds debugging options.

description: Adds debugging options.

name: Enable external browser
description: Open url outside the app in an external browser.

name: Enable force minimized player
description: Keep player permanently minimized even if another track is played.

name: Enable gradient loading screen
description: Enables gradient loading screen.

name: Enable landscape mode
description: Enables entry into landscape mode by screen rotation on the phone.

name: Enable language switch
description: Enable/disable language switch toggle.

name: Enable minimized playback
description: Enables minimized playback on Kids music.

name: Enable minimized playback
description: Enables minimized and background playback.

name: Enable music search
description: Enables music search in the voice search screen.

name: Enable new player background
description: Enable new player background.

name: Enable opus codec
description: Enable opus codec when playing audio.

description: Adds a grey tint to the video player to reduce eye strain.
